body_html:
This is certainly unfortunate.
Apparently, SWIG intentionally ignores the 'const'-ness of the parameter. Let's add a comment to that effect in all these 3 sites:

// For const parameters in a function, SWIG pretty much ignores the const.
// See: http://www.swig.org/Doc2.0/SWIG.html#SWIG_nn13
// Hence the 'const_cast'.
